name: Christmas Carols
description:
Christmas Carols is a rhythm game for the original Game Boy. Hit the buttons to the cadence of the music and beat your highscore.

How to play

Each button has a corresponding icon in the game. The icons tell you which button to press.

Difficulty

The game  has three difficulty levels. The level determines how many different icons the song uses.

Easy

Medium

Hard

Itch.io Controls

  • ↑ = w
  • ← = a
  • →= d
  • ↓ = s
  • A = j
  • B = k

Development

Made with GBStudio, Aseprite, MilkyTracker and Tiled. Source code on GitHub.
